document_data.mainbody:
Anasters Leatherworks was a leathergoods business in the city of Ordulin in the 14 century DR.
Anasters sold a variety of different goods made of leather, including leather balls that came in , , and  sizes.
Sometime in the mid–14 century DR, having took notice that Anasters leather balls were more durable than any others made in Faerûn at the time, Aurora struck up an exclusive licensing deal with Anasters to have her catalogue be the only business that could export their balls beyond the borders of Sembia.
